diff_act: 2.Include user ID in the audit log.
4.Include type of access in the audit log.

regen.absent_element: situation of logging unauthorized access attempts
regen.new_specification: If an unauthorized access attempt is detected, the system shall log the attempt, including the user ID, timestamp, and details of the attempted access.
The system shall log all unauthorized access attempts for future review and investigation purposes.
The system shall log all unauthorized access attempts, including the attempt details, user ID, and timestamp, to safeguard against and investigate potential security breaches.

label: Unauthorised attempts to access cases must be logged in the audit trail.
absence: action of logging of unauthorised attempts to access
